content: hygge pronounced hue-guh is a danish word for cozy charming or special and i think this blanket fits all of those descriptions full of rich textures it is squishy and soft and cozy you will enjoy crocheting this blanket as it changes stitches often so it never gets boring if you need any help with the pattern you can ask me question in my facebook group 1 or join me to just share your love of crochet 1 https //www facebook com/groups/1047818258735492/
